text: There are two main reasons for employing preventive measures against L . infantum infection in a susceptible animal host and suspected reservoir such as the cat : 1 ) to protect the single animal from the risk of developing a clinical disease ; 2 ) and to contribute to the reduction of the prevalence of infection in a geographic area . However , it should be also pointed out that the epidemiological role of the cat as a main reservoir for Leishmania species has not been confirmed [ 34 ] .
